DOC.brief_summary: Bortezomib for treatment of disseminated MALT lymphoma or at relapse following HP -eradication,or chemotherapy or radiation.
DOC.detailed_description: The objectives of this study are to evaluate the effectivity and the safety of bortezomib in patients with disseminated MALT lymphoma or at relapse following HP-eradication, or chemotherapy or radiation. It is a phase II prospective single arm study with a target sample of 16 patients. 1.5mg/m2 Bortezomib is given intravenously on day 1,4,8,11 every three week, for a maximum of 8cycles.
DOC.criteria: patients with histologically confirmed MALT lymphoma with measurable disease (stage IIV) with first or greater relapse after HPeradication, radiation or chemotherapy , age > 18 years must be able to tolerate therapy and have adequate cardiac, renal and hepatic function ECOG status of <_ 2 must be capable of understanding the purpose of the study and given written informed consent
